Mortgage companies dont depend as heavily on interest rates as youd think. They loan out other peoples money, not their own. They dont care if theyre collecting 2 or 8, its free money to them anyway. The lower the interest rate the more money overall they will be able to lend out and the more interest and loan origination fees they can collect. Its better for them to collect 3 off a trillion dollars than 10 off a hundred billion dollars

Some of that money comes in the form of monthly inflows from all the 401Ks out there. Even when the shit hits the proverbial fan like in 2020, people still leave their 401K alone. So every couple of weeks all these passive investors are autobuying lowfee index funds from their paychecks no matter if the market is up or down. Thats why the two biggest shareholders of Apple are Invesco QQQ and Vanguard. That ultimately puts a positive pressure on price, with more weight to the largest companies due to the composition of the ETFs.

content.text: The negative points seem to suggest a downturn.  Seems data really carried the day.  Otherwise, what was good?  Because these connector companies feed the entire market, across segments, it sounds scary.
APH is one of the few stocks up today in a blodd bath.
Nice job Amphenol, from a pleased shareholder.

If you like companies like NVDA, SMCI, GE etc.  They all  need connectors.  This is just another high tech company thaqt traveses many industries.  A lot of technmology went into development of connectors for data centers.

Congratulations to longs on a tremendous report. Only been holding since August, but it’s becoming a large part of my port. I said this would be a 100B MC by Aug 2025, so we’re right on track. I also recommended APH to TSM longs, hopefully some of them bought.
Hop we go to 75 this week.
earnings up, revenues up, target price 80
Earning should spike upward over the next 6 months with all the rebuilding after the storms for connectors and components not just for power but cell towers, fiber optic cables and homes.

Been a holder of this stock for years and two splits. All the electricity needs sensors and connectors. Who would of thought when I used amphenol connectors for phone work many years ago they would have grown to this size. Definitely a long play stock. Maybe not as volatile as others but steady growth and allows you to sleep at night. Will keep going to 100+ and who knows another split
I just keep accumulating this one.. staying in the shadows. Won’t be surprised when it surpasses $100B market cap a year from now.
